definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
urgent and important moment (idiom); critical juncture
the critical moment/life and death crisis

sentences.english: China's current reform is in this very historical point.
sentences.chinese: 中國目前的改革，正處於這樣的歷史關頭。

sentences.english: In an emergency, buyers under duress have no freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在緊急關頭，買家迫不得已別無選擇。

sentences.english: A crisis, down to the sea of maozedong holds double axes.
sentences.chinese: 危急關頭，雄闊海雙斧殺到。

sentences.english: We are at such a juncture.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處在這樣一個關頭。

sentences.english: In this life-or-death climax , he showed himself a terrible personality.
sentences.chinese: 在這個生死關頭，他表現出一種令人懼怕的性格。

sentences.english: Spirit thousand unreal at the last moment to give up the blast, and black king fight happened.
sentences.chinese: 靈千幻在最後關頭放棄了煉丹，與黑大王發生了打鬥。

sentences.english: It's okay to fly but it is a pain on very long flights or when there is bad turbulence.
sentences.chinese: 坐飛機還好，關頭是飛颶久挺常人的，或者趕上氣流。

sentences.english: She always stays cool, calm and collected in a crisis.
sentences.chinese: 她在危急關頭總是很冷靜鎮定，處之泰然。

sentences.english: What I see are lot of Chinese men would not take off their underwear until the last moment.
sentences.chinese: 很多中國人不到最後關頭是不會脫掉底褲的。

sentences.english: Mrs. Fitzgerald at the last minute dived and saved her fish.
sentences.chinese: 最後關頭菲茨格爾德太太跳下了水，救起了她的魚。

sentences.english: Water is one of your most urgent needs in a survival situation.
sentences.chinese: 在生死關頭之際，水是您最緊急的需求之一。

sentences.english: The outcome of the soccer final was touch and go for the entire match.
sentences.chinese: 足球冠軍賽的勝負，不到最後關頭無法定論。

sentences.english: In crisis situations, I usually calm myself, then act.
sentences.chinese: 在危急關頭，我通常保持冷靜，然後採取行動。

sentences.english: Song Yuan time, becomes in the Chinese currency history the silver monetization crucial phase.
sentences.chinese: 宋元時期，成爲中國貨泉史上白銀貨泉化的關頭時期。

sentences.english: Our marriage was at a watershed.
sentences.chinese: 我們的婚姻到了一個轉折關頭。

sentences.english: We are at a critical moment in our history.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處於歷史的緊要關頭。
